entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error performing rename: Unexpected value 'FunctionPointerType' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.SyntaxKind' #70881
  • Collection expressions: align `ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind()` with conversions specification #70880
  • Move us to official System.IO.Hashing package once we can. #70878

Closed

  • [Bug]: Cannot go to definition of source-generated type #70832
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34317.88 #70885
  • Use primary constructor (IDE0290) ignores side effects #70868
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34316.174 #70876
  • IDE0251: Triggering On Readonly Property's Init Accessor #70864
  • The SyntaxWalker API doesn't handle deeply nested syntax nodes well. #70834

PullRequests

Created

  • Pool intermediary collections when performing classification tagging/aggregation. #70884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cut off deeply nested collection expressions #70882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ship Devkit dependencies as a nuget package to support directly including in the C# extension #70875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Improve formatting when converting to a collection expression #70883
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix use-primary-constructor in the presence of side-effects on the parameters. #70871
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • NRT enable storage layer #70877
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'make struct member readonly' with init accessors. #70869
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Run .NET Core MSBuildWorkspace tests on machines with VS installed #70849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of SyntaxWalker and mark it as banned in roslyn #70811
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Downgrade editor packages to fix build break #70872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: IOperation support #70650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove ImmutableDictionary usage when passing telemetry property information. #70845
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
